message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. It's best to settle this quickly before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
I think a 55/45 split is fairer, considering the inflation.  Let's work together to maximize our gains!
Bob, let's be realistic. Inflation is hurting both of us. I'm offering 58/42. It's a slight improvement for you from my last offer, and waiting any longer will just hurt us both.
